Showcase your event with an awesome and optimized landing page

Open a gateway to your event, greet your audience and give attendees a sneak peek at the event content and schedule

Publish interesting news and use a newsletter to increase audience engagement

Create an engaging event conference agenda with multiple conference halls and unlimited live sessions

Set up an interactive expo hall with virtual booths. Let your exhibitors show off effectively

Allow your participants to search for relevant networking contacts within the audience

Let your event participants communicate and share their opinion in group chats

Allow event participants to publish announcements and promote their companies

Give your participants the ability to schedule appointments and successful meetings with one click

Get real-time statistics and measure success using evidence-based results

Section Slider

EventsWallet is an innovative SaaS event platform for in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. The platform allows expo and conference organisers to run an effective event by keeping the audience engaged with easy-to-use event management and communication web and app tools.
